resources.string: Enter a name for the category you would like to create.
Note that if you already have a category of the same name it will be overwritten.
Enter the items you would like to add to your category and press the finish button once you are done
Here you can create categories, as well as edit, delete or upload categories you\'ve created.
Here you can download categories from the remote database. Note that any categories downloaded from the remote database will replace local categories of the same name.

Pick a category, then place your device on your forehead. It\'s up to your friends to help you guess what\'s displayed on the screen - without saying it\'s name. Tilt your device down if you manage to get it right, or up to pass.
Charades++ lets you create your own categories, as well as share your categories and download categories others have created.

Here you can enter a Wikipedia link and the app will attempt to generate a category from the page. Please note that generating a category from a Wikipedia page does not always work, and results vary from page to page. For best results, use a page with a table from which items can be extracted.
